Great Morning, the construction of THF's New Headquarters is underway! With this new state of the art campus we'll increase our capacity to impact THOUSANDS of lives over the years. Here's to thoughts and dreams becoming things! From a 200 sq ft. closet at Naval Special Warfare to 9,000 sq. Ft. in Sorrento Valley! In 4 years.
Thanks to Navy SEAL Foundation. Without your continued support this important work wouldn't have the impact it currently does!

This incredible team of instructional designers at ServiceSource has blown us away with their hard work and creativity. Working as partners to create e-learning has been a great experience. In record time, they integrated Factor 8 training into e-learning for their teams at Service Source and they’re using it in a blended learning environment. Can't wait to see the results of the Factor 8 training in combination with this team's hard work. Kudo’s to the Service Source Instructional Design team! Thanks to Kathleen Liles for working hard on this, too!

It is rare to find someone with deep experience and valuable insights across multiple industries who also brings a rare charisma and positivity to any room he occupies.  I've worked with Sean as a partner at GrowthX for the last three years, and I have learned that I can always rely upon Sean to have a productive and positive approach to every interaction.  I value not only his exceptional communication skills and entrepreneurial acumen, but especially his ability to create and sustain energy and enthusiasm in the people and projects he touches.

Jeff Kasper
National Sales Director
August 7, 2016, Jeff was a client of Sean’s

Sean has a keen eye for success whether it's the opportunities or the people he invests in. I can personally attest to the fact that he truly stands by his belief that the most important thing is to see how he can be helpful to others. I'm grateful to have met Sean through the thinnest of threads. He has opened my eyes not only professionally, but also personally. He can identify where you're off and offers his help to align you if you're willing. Other than being a sales expert in the startup industry he is generous, genuine, patient, grateful, compassionate and approachable. He loves to see others succeed and bring the right people together. After 3 weeks in GrowthX Academy, I will say it has been way more than I expected. I am confident after graduation I will be quite capable to guide businesses to success in the market.

Reduce onboarding time, Increase client engagement, and Retain customers & partners in a better way.
August 2, 2016, Casey reported directly to Sean

Sean is one of the most empowering and inspiring people that I have met in my life. He really sees the big picture and understands the strategies and best practices for how to reach personal and professional goals. I decided to go through the Sales & Business Development track at GrowthX academy after feeling burned out with my silicon valley sales job. Sean has really helped me see the ways in which I can improve so that I can be a more valuable asset to any company, especially silicon valley tech startups.By sharpening my skills in sales, leadership, and market knowledge, I feel more confident than ever about my professional abilities and the ways in which I can add to any company that I decide to join. I am really looking forward to finishing my experience with GrowthX academy and moving on to be a key player at a company that can benefit from my improved skill set.

Jeff Gilmore
Operations Manager at Facebook
August 1, 2016, Sean worked with Jeff in the same group

Sean is a great entrepreneur, mentor, and now friend.  I was originally introduced to him back in 2014 when I was transitioning from active duty to a tech career.  Sean was a great mentor.  He connected me with people who had been through similar experiences and helped me recognize that none of this is 'rocket surgery'. Sales is just finding a need and connecting people to ideas.  He upped my ability to sell ideas to diverse audiences. Those experiences have proven valuable time and time again as I've transitioned to the Valley. Thanks Sean!
